questions.text: 21. Carla and Rob were surprised to learn that coastal cities
options: A contain nearly half the world’s population
B include most of the world’s largest cities
C are growing twice as fast as other cities
questions.correct_answer: B include most of the world’s largest cities

questions.text: 22. According to Rob, building coastal cities near to rivers
options: A may bring pollution to the cities
B may reduce the land available for agriculture
C may mean the countryside is spoiled by industry
questions.correct_answer: A may bring pollution to the cities

questions.text: 23. What mistake was made when building water drainage channels in Miami in the 1950s?

B They were made of unsuitable materials
C They did not allow for the effects of climate change

questions.text: 24. What do Rob and Carla think that the authorities in Miami should do immediately?
